info.longBusinessSummary: eREX Co.,Ltd. engages in the electric power business in Japan and internationally. The company operates biomass power plants; and engages in a hydrogen power generation demonstration project. It is also involved in the development and production of biomass fuels from wood pellets; electricity trading; and electricity retailing to corporate and individual consumers. eREX Co.,Ltd incorporated in 1999 and is headquartered in Chuo, Japan.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Toshimichi  Tanaka
companyOfficers.title: MD, GM of the Supply & Demand Strategy Office & Director
